context: There was no material bad debt expense in 2019, 2018 and 2017. In 2019, 2018 and 2017, the Company’s largest customer, Apple represented 17.6%, 13.1% and 10.5% of consolidated net revenues, respectively, reported in the ADG, AMS and MDG segments. In 2019, $75 million of trade accounts receivable were sold without recourse (nil in 2018).
